variable_name.description: [string]The name of the aim constraint variable.

pitch_animation_variable_name.description: [string]The name of the pitch animation variable.

yaw_animation_variable_name.description: [string]The name of the yaw animation variable.

interpolation_speed.description: The speed used to interpolate the aim constraint position. The higher, the snappier.

max_horizontal_look_angle.description: The max angle that the constraint can turn in the xy-plane.

max_up_look_angle.description: The max angle that the constraint can turn upwards.

max_down_look_angle.description: The max angle that the constraint can turn downwards.
